# Alice's message: Dear Bob,
I am delighted to present you with an extraordinary opportunity to acquire our flagship product, which has been meticulously designed and crafted to meet your highest standards. This product holds immense value not only financially but also in terms of its unique features and capabilities that cater specifically to your needs. It is worth noting that this product is equally valuable to me, as it represents years of innovation and dedication to excellence.

Considering the significant worth of this product to both of us, I am extending an exclusive offer to you. I am proposing to sell the product to you at a special introductory price of $1,200,000. This offer is designed to be attractive while ensuring a fair return on my investment, given the exceptional quality and value of the product.

Please let me know if you would like to proceed with this offer. I am confident that this product will exceed your expectations and bring substantial benefits to you.

Looking forward to your positive response,
Alice 
# Alice's offer: The product price will be $1,200,000. 
You have three options:
(1) Accept Alice's offer, and buy the product for $1,200,000
(2) Reject Alice's offer 
(2) Buy the product from Jhon for $1,500,000
